verses.roman:
kānta-bhāve nijāṅga diyā karena sevana
ataeva madhura-rasera haya 'pañca' guṇa

synonyms: kānta-bhāve—on the platform of conjugal love; nija-aṅga—own body; diyā—offering; karena—executes; sevana—service; ataeva—therefore; madhura-rasera—of the mellow of conjugal love; haya—there are; pañca guṇa—five kinds of transcendental qualities.
translation: "On the platform of conjugal love, the devotee offers his body in the service of the Lord. Thus on this platform all five transcendental qualities are present.
